pkgmetadata.longdescription: README===================*obsinfo* is a system for for creating FDSN-standard data and metadata forocean bottom seismometers using standardized, easy-to-read information files Current goal-------------------To come out with a first version (v1.x) schema for the information files. Wewould like input from seismologists and ocean bottom seismometermanufacturers/operators about what information/capabilities are missing. Existing questions can be found/modified in the gitlab `ISSUES <https://gitlab.com/resif/obsinfo/-/issues>`_`Documentation <https://obsinfo.readthedocs.io/en/latest/index.html>`_`Source code <https://gitlab.com/resif/obsinfo>`_Versioning----------------We use standard MAJOR.MINOR.MAINTENANCE version numbering but, while thesystem is in prerelease:- MAJOR==0- MINOR increments every time the information file structure changes in a **non-backwards-compatible** way- MAINTENANCE increments when the code changes or the file structure changes in a **backwards-compatible** way
